name: Reinvent the Wheel
description:
Made for the fifth annual GitHub/Itch.io Game Off game jam. Taking the theme 'throwback' to the extreme, Reinvent The Wheel takes you to the stone age for a chance to rewrite history! Fashion a wheel with the limited time and resources given to you, and challenge your friends to see who's invention will travel the farthest!

Awards:

  • IEEE GameSig 2018 PEOPLE'S CHOICE AWARD
  • IEEE GameSig 2018 2ND PLACE 
  • Fifth Annual GitHub/Itch.io Game Off Game Jam 2ND PLACE out of 206
  • Fifth Annual GitHub/Itch.io STAFF PICK

Developed by Monument Games, a group of students in California State University Long Beach's Video Game Development Association.

Visit our website at www.monumentgames.net
